Package it.polimi.ingsw.god

Interface God

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicGod, BuildBeforeWorkerMove, BuildDome, BuildInTheSamePosition, DownTwoOrMoreLevelsWin, GodDecorator, MoveBeforeBuild, MoveTwice, MoveWorkerTwice, NotMoveUp, OpponentBlock, OtherPositionToBuild, ShiftWorker, SwitchWorker
public interface God
This interface represents the God for the decorator pattern

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> effects  
    static java.lang.String name
    These attributes are the God name, his ability description and the decorators that it is gone to use

    • setPossibleMove

      void setPossibleMove​(Worker worker)
      This method tells which positions can get reached by a worker
      Parameters:
      worker - Which worker is the check applied

    • setPossibleBuild

      void setPossibleBuild​(Worker worker)
      This method tells which positions can get built by a worker
      Parameters:
      worker - Which worker is the check applied

    • moveWorker

      boolean moveWorker​(Worker worker, Box pos)
      This method moves the chosen worker to the new position on the board
      Parameters:
      worker - Which worker is applied the move
      pos - Position on the board where the worker wants to go
      Returns:
      False if you can do another move; true if the move has done successfully

    • moveBlock

      boolean moveBlock​(Box pos)
      This method builds a building block in a position on the board
      Parameters:
      pos - Position on the board where the worker builds a building block
      Returns:
      False if you can do another construction; true if the move has done successfully

    • checkWin

      boolean checkWin​(Box initialPos, Box finalBox)
      This methods checks if the player win
      Parameters:
      initialPos - Position on the board where the worker starts to move
      finalBox - Position on the board where the worker arrives
      Returns:
      False if the player doesn't win; true if the player wins
